Title: The Old Map
Description:
The old, faded leather is falling apart, but still legible.

Scrawled on it is some kind of map, and the following lines:


Deep in the valley where four winds blow,
The maiden laughs behind her golden fan.
At the feet of her ancestors' stair,
She whispers secrets into the echoing dark.
ObjectivesText: Show the map to Fish Fellreed at Cattail Lake or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
